message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $250. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
I'm really interested in the product, but $250 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $175?

Hi Bob, thanks for the counteroffer! I understand that $250 is a bit steep, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $175. How about we meet in the middle at $225? It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $225 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $180 for the product. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Hi Bob, I understand that $180 is still a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet at $200? It's still a good deal for both of us, and I think you'll really love the product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but $200 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $175 for the product. I'm really interested in getting this product, so I'm hoping we can meet at this price.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate that. However, I've already compromised a lot, and I'm not willing to go any lower than $190. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I'm really close to my budget, Alice, and I'm willing to pay $170 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet at this price. I'm not sure I can go any lower than this.
